text: Aspergillus microcysticus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. Aspergillus microcysticus produces aspochalasin A, aspochalasin C, aspochalasin D, and the antibiotic asposterol. ==Growth and morphology== A. microcysticus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_microcysticus_cya.png|Aspergillus microcysticus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_microcysticus_meaox.png|Aspergillus microcysticus growing on MEAOX plate ==References== ==Further reading== * * * microcysticus Category:Fungi described in 1955
title: Aspergillus microcysticus
